title: Quantum Computing for Energy Workshop
description: Facilitated a workshop, bridging the gap between Quantum Computing research and the Energy Sector. Hosted at the Royal Society; in partnership with the Department for Science, Innovation and Technology, and the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

maps.description: Facilitated for a workshop, bridging the gap between Quantum Computing research and the Energy Sector. Hosted at the Royal Society; in partnership with the Department for Science, Innovation and Technology, and the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

title: Energy Efficient Computing Workshop
description: Attended a conference by STFC Scientific Computing at Rutherford Appleton Laboratory, in partnership with the Computational Science Centre for Research Communities (CoSeC). Topics ranged from Linear Algebra and floating point precision to community engagement and the reality of HPC data centres like ARCHER2.

maps.description:
Attended a conference by STFC Scientific Computing at Rutherford Appleton Laboratory, in partnership with the Computational Science Centre for Research Communities (CoSeC).

Topics ranged from Linear Algebra and floating point precision to community engagement and the reality of HPC data centres like ARCHER2.

title: Summer Student Showcase
description: Presented my project on the facilitation of the Quantum Hackathon to the NQCC team.

title: UK Quantum Hackathon 2025
description: Organiser for the fourth UK Quantum Hackathon, hosted at the University of Edinburgh as part of the Quantum Fringe celebrating the International Year of Quantum Science and Technology.

maps.description:
Organiser for the fourth UK Quantum Hackathon, hosted at the University of Edinburgh as part of the Quantum Fringe celebrating the International Year of Quantum Science and Technology.

Part of my Events Coordinator Summer Placement at the National Quantum Computing Centre (NQCC).

title: SpurHacks
description: Second event as a Major League Hacking Coach, training with Kari Groszewska. The inaugural SpurHacks organised by Konfer inc and Spur in Waterloo, ON, Canada.

title: AstonHack 10
description: Participated in the 10th annual Hackathon at Aston University, collaborated with a Birmingham student & a Durham student to create a painting with Digital eyes that follow faces.

title: DurHack 2024
description: Hacker Experience Officer for DurHack 2024, the largest MLH event in the UK and 2nd largest student-run Hackathon in Europe! DurHack 2024 had: Over 1,000 Applications, 600 Participants, with 206 external students from Cambridge, Imperial, Warwick, Nottingham etc, 130+ Projects submitted to our Devpost page

maps.description:
Hacker Experience Officer for DurHack 2024, the largest MLH event in the UK and 2nd largest student-run Hackathon in Europe!

DurHack 2024 had:
Over 1,000 Applications
600 Participants, with 206 external students from Cambridge, Imperial, Warwick, Nottingham etc
130+ Projects submitted to our Devpost page
